channel.title: If u can make mods u well be admin gangstascape.no-ip.org
channel.description: :mad: im so mad i dun no how to make mods if u kno how go on my server gangstascape.no-ip.org all make u admin and get u credits

you cant compile?? whats the point in making a server if u cant compile what dose it say [br][size=1]Posted at: August 11, 2006, 06:17:02 PM[/size][hr]ive got an idea post ur source or ur msn addy and ill add u and ill do it as it will let me compile mine

item.title: If u can make mods u well be admin gangstascape.no-ip.org
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“gangstaart1, post:1, topic:8962”]:mad: im so mad i dun no how to make mods if u kno how go on my server gangstascape.no-ip.org all make u admin and get u credits[/quote] To mod someone go to the characters folder and look at the document of the character you wanna mod. Somewhere it should say playerrights=0 just change that to 1 which will make him a pmod, 2 which will make him admin, and 3 which will make him owner.

Read full topic
item.source: If u can make mods u well be admin gangstascape.no-ip.org

item.title: If u can make mods u well be admin gangstascape.no-ip.org
item.dc:creator: @philip_l_g philip_l_g
item.description:
@philip_l_g wrote:

okay easy… go to your character file and open your charcter file you want to make admin and search for rights and it should say playerrights = 0 that makes a normal player to amke someone with w silver crown have 1 to make someone with gold crown have 2 and to make you a owner (you cant see you own crown but othrs can) put 3 and if that didnt work open client.java of you client and search for rights and it should say under a line with a name at the end something like playerrights = 0 or 1 or 2 or 3 and just change the name and the rights that you want to make someone

Read full topic
